file.name: customer_openapi.yaml
file.content:
components:
  schemas:
    CommNullReply:
      type: object
    CommNullReq:
      type: object
    GoogleProtobufTimestamp:
      properties:
        nanos:
          description: Non-negative fractions of a second at nanosecond resolution.
            Negative second values with fractions must still have non-negative nanos
            values that count forward in time. Must be from 0 to 999,999,999 inclusive.
          format: int32
          type: integer
        seconds:
          description: Represents seconds of UTC time since Unix epoch 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z.
            Must be from 0001-01-01T00:00:00Z to 9999-12-31T23:59:59Z inclusive.
          format: int64
          type: integer
      type: object
    UsersV1Customer:
      properties:
        account:
          description: 账户
          type: string
        avatar:
          description: 头像
          type: string
        birthday:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/GoogleProtobufTimestamp'
        create_time:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/GoogleProtobufTimestamp'
        email:
          description: 邮箱
          type: string
        id:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        id_card:
          description: 身份证
          type: string
        last_ip:
          description: 最后登录ip
          type: string
        last_time:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/GoogleProtobufTimestamp'
        mobile:
          description: 手机
          type: string
        name:
          description: 姓名
          type: string
        nick_name:
          description: 昵称
          type: string
        role:
          description: 角色
          type: string
        sex:
          description: 性别
          type: string
        update_time:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/GoogleProtobufTimestamp'
        uuid:
          type: string
      type: object
    UsersV1CustomerList:
      properties:
        list:
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/UsersV1Customer'
          type: array
      type: object
    UsersV1CustomerLogin:
      properties:
        account:
          description: 账户
          type: string
        captcha:
          description: 验证码
          type: string
        code:
          description: 短信、邮箱 验证码
          type: string
        password:
          description: 密码
          type: string
      type: object
    UsersV1CustomerLoginRes:
      properties:
        customer:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/UsersV1Customer'
        expiration_time:
          description: 过期时间 字符串时间戳
          format: int64
          type: integer
        role:
          description: 角色
          type: string
        token:
          description: jwt token
          type: string
      type: object
    UsersV1CustomerOption:
      properties:
        account:
          description: 账户
          type: string
        avatar:
          description: 头像
          type: string
        birthday:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/GoogleProtobufTimestamp'
        email:
          description: 邮箱
          type: string
        id:
          description: id
          format: int64
          type: integer
        id_card:
          description: 身份证
          type: string
        mobile:
          description: 手机
          type: string
        name:
          description: 姓名
          type: string
        nick_name:
          description: 昵称
          type: string
        password:
          description: 密码
          type: string
        role:
          description: 角色
          type: string
        sex:
          description: 性别
          type: string
      type: object
info:
  description: users.v1
  title: users.v1
  version: "1"
openapi: 3.0.0
paths:
  /users/customer:
    description: 更新用户信息
    put:
      description: 更新用户信息
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/UsersV1CustomerOption'
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UsersV1Customer'
          description: ok
      summary: 更新用户信息
      tags:
      - users.v1.CustomerService
    summary: Update
  /users/customer/{id}:
    description: 获取账户信息
    get:
      description: 获取账户信息
      parameters:
      - in: query
        name: id
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UsersV1Customer'
          description: ok
      summary: 获取账户信息
      tags:
      - users.v1.CustomerService
    summary: Get
  /users/customer/captcha:
    description: 发送短信/邮箱验证码
    get:
      description: 发送短信/邮箱验证码
      parameters:
      - description: 接收对象 email
        in: query
        name: to
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: 本地验证码
        in: query
        name: captcha
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: 极验预留
        in: query
        name: challenge
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: 极验预留
        in: query
        name: tk
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CommNullReply'
          description: ok
      summary: 发送短信/邮箱验证码
      tags:
      - users.v1.CustomerService
    summary: Captcha
  /users/customer/info:
    description: 当前登录用户信息
    get:
      description: 当前登录用户信息
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UsersV1Customer'
          description: ok
      summary: 当前登录用户信息
      tags:
      - users.v1.CustomerService
    summary: UserInfo
  /users/customer/login:
    description: 常规账户登录接口
    post:
      description: 常规账户登录接口
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/UsersV1CustomerLogin'
        description: 用户登录
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UsersV1CustomerLoginRes'
          description: ok
      summary: 常规账户登录接口
      tags:
      - users.v1.CustomerService
    summary: Login
  /users/customer/login-code:
    description: 验证码登录
    post:
      description: 验证码登录
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/UsersV1CustomerLogin'
        description: 用户登录
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UsersV1CustomerLoginRes'
          description: ok
      summary: 验证码登录
      tags:
      - users.v1.CustomerService
    summary: LoginForCode
  /users/customer/logout:
    description: 登出
    post:
      description: 登出
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/CommNullReq'
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CommNullReply'
          description: ok
      summary: 登出
      tags:
      - users.v1.CustomerService
    summary: Logout
tags:
- description: 客户用户服务
  name: users.v1.CustomerService

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /users/customer/{id}: get: parse path: path parameter not specified: "id"
